summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 ARCTIC CAT F6 SNOW MOBILE. THE CONTACT STATED AFTER ADDING FUEL TO THE VEHICLE IT ENGULFED INTO FLAMES. AN EXTENSIVE AMOUNT OF FUEL LEAKED ONTO THE GROUND FROM THE FUEL TANK. THE CONTACT EXTINGUISHED THE FIRE. THE VEHICLE WAS DESTROYED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE DEFECT. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 1,600.
